columns.name: Position
columns.description: The position of the variant on the chromosome. This defines at which base the variant occurs.

columns.name: Gene Symbol
columns.description: This mutation is found in the given gene.

columns.name: Phenotypes
columns.description: The phenotypes this mutation can cause.

columns.name: Allele frequency Africa
columns.description: The frequency of the the allele in the given population.

columns.name: Allele frequency Native America
columns.description: The frequency of the the allele in the given population.

columns.name: Allele frequency East Asia
columns.description: The frequency of the the allele in the given population.

columns.name: Maximum of allele frequencies among all populations
columns.description: The maximum frequency of the the allele across all populations.

columns.name: Related PubMed articles
columns.description: PubMed articles associated with this mutation.

columns.name: Clinical Significance
columns.description: The clinical significance of the mutation.

columns.name: Conservation (GERP)
columns.description: Genomic Evolutionary Rate Profiling (GERP) score. A score used to calculate the conservation of each nucleotide in multi-species alignment. Ranges from -12.3 to 6.17, with 6.17 being the most conserved.
